sqlMap.select: select id,name,password,create_time as createTime,address,signature,update_time as updateTime from t_user where id=#id#;
select id,name,password,create_time as createTime,address,signature,update_time as updateTime from t_user where name=#name#;
select id,name,password,create_time as createTime,address,signature,update_time as updateTime from t_user order by create_time desc limit #start#,#limit#;
select id,name,password,create_time as createTime,address,signature,update_time as updateTime from t_user where name=#name# and password=#password#;
